          <title>
            <string language="sl">Panonski svet</string>
            <string language="en">Pannonian basin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pannonian Bassin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bassin de Pannonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bacia de Pannonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bacino di Pannonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λεκάνη Pannonian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lavabo de Pannonian</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prispevek so učenci pripravili pri pouku. Z njim so predstavili lego, relief, vodovje in podnebje posamezne naravne enote Slovenije.</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of Slovenian part of Pannonian basin (basic properties, climate, rivers, towns, landscape, ...).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">panonska nižina</string>
            <string language="en">pannonian basin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">mesto</string>
            <string language="en">town</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slovenija</string>
            <string language="en">slovenia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">reka</string>
            <string language="en">river</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">geografija</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung des slowenisch Teils des Pannonian 
Bassins (grundlegende Eigenschaften, Klima, Flüsse, Städte, 
Landschaft...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation de partie slovène de bassin de 
Pannonian (propriétés de base, climat, fleuves, villes, 
horizontal...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação da parte eslovena da bacia de 
Pannonian (propriedades básicas, clima, rios, cidades, paisagem...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione della parte slovena del bacino di 
Pannonian (proprietà di base, clima, fiumi, città, paesaggio...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση του σλοβένικου μέρους της λεκάνης 
Pannonian (βασικές ιδιότητες, κλίμα, ποταμοί, πόλεις, 
τοπίο...).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de la parte eslovena del lavabo de 
Pannonian (características básicas, clima, ríos, ciudades, 
paisaje...).</string>
          </description>
